entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23.
